categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic starships

nodes.text: The Breha was a diplomatic vessel used by the Alliance to Restore the Republic. Its design greatly resembled that of a J-type 327 Nubian starship. At some point following the destruction of the Death Star, Leia Organa and Luke Skywalker used the Breha to go on a secret mission to Tibrin, posing as diplomats from Naboo's House Berenko seeking to negotiate a trade deal. The Breha was blown into the water by Imperial forces during the mission.
